name: Classic Cotton T-Shirt
category: A premium quality cotton t-shirt with a comfortable fit. Made from 100% organic cotton, this versatile piece is perfect for everyday wear. Unisex design suitable for all.

name: Premium Polo Shirt
category: Sophisticated polo shirt with classic collar design. Perfect for corporate wear and casual outings. Premium cotton blend fabric with moisture-wicking properties.

name: Elegant Silk Blouse
category: Beautiful women's blouse with flowing fabric and elegant design. Perfect for office wear and special occasions. Made from premium silk blend for comfort and sophistication.

name: Cozy Winter Sweatshirt
category: Comfortable unisex sweatshirt perfect for casual wear and layering. Soft fleece interior and durable construction. Ideal for Indian winters and air-conditioned spaces.
